data.title: Banked : Real time payments for consumers, businesses and banks.
data.description: Real time payments for consumers, businesses and banks.

image.alt: Real time payments for consumers businesses and banks

items.question: What does Banked do?

answer.text: Banked is a payments platform that facilities account to account bank payments in real time. It's a fast and secure way to pay. In addition, Banked provides value added services for a business to enable customer engagement and loyalty with incentives and rewards integrated into the payment experience.

items.question: What is Pay by Bank?

answer.text: Pay by Bank is the checkout experience for a customer. This could be via a checkout button or a payment link using a QR code or an SMS message. At checkout, when you choose Pay by Bank : as your payment method, you will be asked to select your bank which then creates a secure link in order to authorise your payment. Once the transaction is authorised, you are redirected back to the checkout page. No card details are needed, there’s no need to create an account and no personal financial information is shared.

items.question: How do I pay with Pay by Bank?

answer.text: Select. Connect. Approve.
At checkout, look for the  Pay by Bank : button and select as your payment method.
Follow the simple steps to choose and connect securely to your bank.
Approve your purchase, securely via your banking app or with online banking.

After payment approval you will be redirected back to our checkout page. No card details are needed, there’s no need to create an account and your personal financial information stays between you and your bank.

items.question: Is Pay by Bank safe?

answer.text: When a customer uses Pay by Bank, a secure connection is created between the customer and the bank to authorise a payment. No payment credentials are shared and you authenticate using your banking login details such as FaceID or TouchID, making it much more difficult for a fraudster to make a transaction using your information.

items.question: Do I need to create an account to use Pay by Bank?

answer.text: No, customers do not need to create a new account with Banked to use Pay by Bank. Simply select Pay by Bank at checkout and follow simple steps to securely connect with your bank to authorise the payment.

items.question: Where can I use Pay by Bank?

answer.text: Anywhere where you see the Pay by Bank logo or the QR code. We are working with partners and retailers to bring Pay by Bank to more checkouts over the next few months.

items.question: How is my data used when I Pay by Bank?

answer.text: No financial data is stored by Banked, that stays between you and your bank. Your personal data remains private and is only used to process a payment. Please see our Privacy Policy for more information.

items.question: I don’t recognise a payment that has left my account, what should I do?

answer.text: If you suspect fraudulent activity with your transaction through Banked then please contact our compliance department at compliance@banked.com where we will assist you.

items.question: How does the Pay by Bank checkout work?

answer.text: There are three simple steps to Pay by Bank. When you choose Pay by Bank as your payment method you will be asked to select your bank, you'll then be redirected via secure link to your banking app or online banking to authorise the payment. Once the transaction is authorised, you are redirected back to the checkout page.

items.question: How do QR code payments work?

answer.text: Where a QR code is included in an invoice or bill as a payment method, simply scan the QR code using your camera on your mobile phone and this will take you to a secure link to select your bank and authorise your payment.

items.question: Why are my consumers / am i being charged for my transaction by the bank?

answer.text: Some banks in the EU are charging consumers for using SEPA instant. Whilst this is the consumer Banks prerogative to do so, we at Banked : believe it to be a small number of banks across the EU as we identify these we are working with them to understand the reason why and how we can encourage them to stop on consumer and merchant behalf.

items.question: How do I get started?

answer.text: 1. Create a Banked account
2. Read our API documentation
3. Create a test payment
4. Review how to integrate Banked into your site or app
5. Go Live & Start Taking Payments!

items.question: Where can I find your API documentation?

answer.text: Please go to our Developer Documentation section on our website.

items.question: How do I get a developer account?

answer.text: Simply click here and follow the steps!

items.question: What banks do you support?

answer.text: View our supported providers here.

items.question: How long does it take to integrate?

answer.text: You could be up and running within a few hours. See our Developer Documentation section of the website for more information?

items.question: Is Banked authorised and regulated?

answer.text: Yes, Banked is regulated by the FCA. Company number 11047186, firm reference number 816944.

items.question: Do I need to be regulated to take payments with Pay by Bank?

answer.text: No, as Banked is regulated by the FCA as a PISP, this means your company is covered by our license.

items.question: What is the pricing for Pay by Bank?

answer.text: Direct bank to bank transactions are significantly cheaper to process than cards. In addition there are no set up fees, no chargebacks and significantly lower fraud costs than card processing. Talk to sales to find out more and to obtain a price quote.

items.question: Does Banked partner with any existing PSPs or payment providers?

answer.text: Banked partners with a number of payment gateways and payments platforms to give merchants choice in how to integrate Pay by Bank and add it to existing payment options. Partners include Gr4vy, Primer, Apexx and Thought Machine.

items.question: Does Banked support Strong Customer Authentication (SCA)?

answer.text: Yes. Security is paramount to Banked and, in compliance with PSD2, multi-factor authentication is part of every transaction processed.

items.question: What is the easiest way for me to take direct bank payments on my website?

answer.text: If you want to simply plug in and go, our hosted checkout is for you. You can be up and running within a couple of hours. For more customisation options and control, try our embedded checkout.

items.question: How do I contact support?

answer.text: You can email support@banked.com.

items.question: How can I check the status of Banked?

answer.text: You can monitor our platform status, as well as the status of all supported banks on our status page. You can also sign up to receive status notifications.

items.question: When can I start making live payments?

answer.text: When you sign up for Banked, we will perform the necessary compliance checks on your  business. Until this is done, you will only be able to create test payments. As soon as the compliance checks have been passed, your account will be updated, and you will be able to retrieve your live API keys and create live payments.

items.question: How quickly will I get my money with a Pay by Bank payment?

answer.text: Banked operates with real time payments so payments are settled instantly.
